about.title: About us
about.subtitle: Passionate web developers focused on local businesses
about.story: We started WebbEnkelt with a simple idea: to make professional websites accessible to all local businesses. As experienced developers, we saw that many small businesses needed help being visible online, but most solutions were either too expensive or too complicated.
about.mission: Our mission is to help local businesses grow by giving them the tools they need to succeed online. We believe in transparency, simplicity and personal service.

member1.name: Anna Karlsson
member1.description: 10+ years of web development experience and passion for clean code

member2.name: Erik Johansson
member2.description: Specialist in user-friendly design that converts visitors to customers

info.title: Contact information
info.consultationText: We always offer a free consultation where we go through your needs and give you advice regardless of whether you choose to work with us or not.

testimonial1.text: WebbEnkelt helped us get a professional website that truly represents our restaurant. Bookings have increased by 40% since launch!
testimonial1.author: Maria Lindström

testimonial2.text: Fantastic service and a team that really understands what small businesses need. Our new website has given us so much more credibility.
testimonial2.author: Johan Eriksson

testimonial3.text: They handled everything from A to Z. I didn't have to think about technology at all, but could focus on my business.
testimonial3.author: Lisa Andersson
